mapper.insert: insert into warehouse_input_sheet (id, batch_id, operator, create_time, purchase_sheet_id, state) values (#{id},#{batchId},#{operator},#{createTime},#{purchaseSheetId},#{state})
mapper.update: update warehouse_input_sheet set batch_id = #{batchId}, operator = #{operator}, create_time = #{createTime}, purchase_sheet_id = #{purchaseSheetId}, `state` = #{state} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select * from warehouse_input_sheet order by id desc limit 0,1 ;
mapper.insert:
insert into warehouse_input_sheet_content (wi_id, pid, quantity, purchase_price, production_date, remark) values
(#{item.wiId},#{item.pid},#{item.quantity},#{item.purchasePrice},#{item.productionDate},#{item.remark})
mapper.select: select sum(warehouse_input_sheet_content.quantity) from warehouse_input_sheet, warehouse_input_sheet_content where state = '审批完成' and warehouse_input_sheet.id = warehouse_input_sheet_content.wi_id and create_time <= #{endTime} and create_time >= #{beginTime};
